decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted SC 1321/PP01, SC 1321/PP02, SC 1321/PP03, SC 1321/PP04 received 13/06/2013 therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - The two storey side extension  hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 1 Cambridge Close, Hounslow.
description: Erection of a two storey side extension and erection of a ground floor front porch
